original_title: The Little Girl We Were and the Women We Are
overview: The film is a documentary where five Indian women survivors of incest and child sexual abuse share their journey from abuse to recovery. They talk about how and where they were abused, who their abuser was, responses they got when they disclosed, the effects of abuse on their lives, what recovery means to them and why they agreed to be part of this project.
title: The Little Girl We Were and the Women We Are
